Experience

Autodesk

Leveraged Open Source frameworks to create reporting tools which helped inform the management team of possible areas of improvement. As I rapidly developed more than 4 apps within a year I gained more new skills at this job than I can list. I also have strongly honed in my goals as a developer since working with Autodesk

CIO, CISO, Co-Founder, Leader

 December 2013 - Present
GrowBotix
 Chandler, AZ

Designed an interface and api system which would allow for embedded hardware to create data to analyze and improve agricultural industries. This design is currently being turned into a prototype to gather feedback for bringing a community driven product to market. This will require our team to properly establish, and manage a community whilst still progressing on the digital assets that we need. When completed our product will vastly drop the barrier to entry for growing fruits and vegetables, as well as revolutionize Big Agriculture.

Network Operations Center Engineer

 May 2014 - June 2015
CWIE
 Phoenix, AZ

Started on the team as a data center floor technichian and quickly got promoted twice within the year. By the end of my time at CWIE I was helping to ensure the company websites stability, internal tools stability, and troubleshooting client infrastructures. In many cases our client's infrastructure had over 3000 active web sessions at any given moment which I helped to troubleshoot.

Full Stack Engineer

1099 Contract

Located and secured contracts requiring major back end and minor front-end work. My skills as a full stack engineer were again increased by this job bringing SEO, contract management, and requirements gathering to the table.

Full Stack Engineer

Aided in establishing brands for small businesses by building out emails, websites, and online assets. Responsive Design, WordPress Programming, JavaScript Programming, and System Administration being used on a daily basis established me as a full stack engineer.
